results.title: Simvastatin Prevents Liver Microthrombosis and Sepsis Induced Coagulopathy in a Rat Model of Endotoxemia
results.text_hl: Notwithstanding, as already demonstrated, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ preserves sinusoidal endothelial cell function during @<m>DISEASE_Endotoxemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019446 @@@endotoxemia@@@ in both preventive and acute schemes of administration.

results.title: Prophylactic simvastatin increased survival during endotoxemia and inhibited granulocyte trafficking in a cell-intrinsic manner.
results.text_hl: Prophylactic @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ increased survival during @<m>DISEASE_Endotoxemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019446 @@@endotoxemia@@@ and inhibited granulocyte trafficking in a cell-intrinsic manner.

results.title: Simvastatin Improves Outcomes of Endotoxin-induced Coagulopathy by Regulating Intestinal Microenvironment.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ improves the prognosis of severe @<m>DISEASE_Endotoxemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019446 @@@endotoxemia@@@, and the intestinal microenvironment participates in this process.

results.title: Simvastatin prevents vascular hyporeactivity during inflammation.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: This study demonstrates potent vasoprotective properties of high-dose @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ during @<m>DISEASE_Endotoxemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019446 @@@endotoxemia@@@ that may be useful for @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@acute systemic inflammation@@@ and associated @DISEASE_Vascular_System_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D057772 @@@vascular hyporeactivity@@@.

citations.NLM: Pleiner J, Schaller G, Mittermayer F, Zorn S, Marsik C, Polterauer S, Kapiotis S, Wolzt M. Simvastatin prevents vascular hyporeactivity during inflammation. Circulation. 2004 Nov 23;110(21):3349-54. PMID: 15520323

results.title: Simvastatin suppresses endotoxin-induced upregulation of toll-like receptors 4 and 2 in vivo.
results.text_hl: In conclusion, high-dose @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ pretreatment blunted @GENE_TLR4 @GENE_7099 @@@TLR4@@@ and @GENE_TLR2 @GENE_7097 @@@TLR2@@@ expression on monocytes in a @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Endotoxemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019446 @@@endotoxemia@@@ model on a posttranscriptional level.
